sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The KOffice package provides kword, kspread, kpresenter, kivio, kontour, krita, kugar, kplato, kchart and kformula.

sect3.title: kword
sect3.para: kword is a framemaker-like word processing and desktop publishing program.

sect3.title: kspread
sect3.para: kspread is a scriptable spreadsheet program.

sect3.title: kpresenter
sect3.para: kpresenter is a presentation builder/display program.

sect3.title: kontour
sect3.para: kontour is a vector drawing program.

sect3.title: krita
sect3.para: krita is a painting and image editing program.

sect3.title: kugar
sect3.para: kugar is a tool for creating reports.

sect3.title: kplato
sect3.para: kplato is a project management application (in early stages of development).

sect3.title: kchart
sect3.para: kchart is a chart drawing application.
